message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm looking for $25000 for it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your enthusiasm. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $18000 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm afraid $18000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $22000. This is my best price, but I think it's still a great deal for you.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I would like to revisit the price. I am proposing $20000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but $20000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $21500. This is my final concession, but I think it's a great value for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to compromise. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $21000 for the product. I believe this offers a good balance between value and affordability.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob, but I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm counteroffering at $22500. This is my last offer, and I hope we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $22000 for the product. I believe this strikes a fair balance between your needs and mine.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet on price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth it for me. I'm counteroffering at $23000. This is my absolute final offer, and I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.

I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $22500 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise and allows us to reach an agreement within my budget.
